name: Lysander
personality: Lysander carries himself with a quiet confidence. While he's certainly capable in combat, he prefers observation and strategy. He often speaks in riddles or cryptic pronouncements.
dialogue_style: Lysander's dialogue is typically measured and thoughtful, often filled with philosophical pondering. He avoids slang and relies on a formal, slightly archaic tone.
background_story: Once a promising student at the Citadel, Lysander mysteriously left his studies to embark on a solitary journey, searching for a lost relic, it is said that it holds the key to unlocking unimaginable power.
interests: Ancient texts, philosophy, mastering combat skills
description: Lysander is a young man dressed in dark, ornate mage armor accented with gold and purple details. He has light blue hair, styled in a face-framing cut. He wields magic, often seen gesturing with closed fists or an outstretched hand, a ready-to-fight stance, implying that he is skilled in combat, making him valuable whether as a party member or formidable antagonist.
